text: The Scarlet and the Black is a 1983 American television war drama movie directed by Jerry London, and starring Gregory Peck and Christopher Plummer. It is based on J. P. Gallagher's book The Scarlet Pimpernel of the Vatican. It was directed by Jerry London. ==References== Category:1983 drama movies Category:1983 war movies Category:American television movies Category:American war movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies set in Vatican City
title: The Scarlet and the Black
